title: Font used for 'Jan Van Eyck Academie' poster series
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anybody help me to find this font ?  
It's used by the french studio Twice for 'Jan Van Eyck Academie Workshops & conferences'.

[http://www.wearetwice.com/arts-culture/jan-van-eyck-academie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829170001/http:/www.wearetwice.com/arts-culture/jan-van-eyck-academie "http://www.wearetwice.com/arts-culture/jan-van-eyck-academie")

Thanks in advance !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829170001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/05-YAN-VAN-EYCK_3643.jpg)
